message: Command `cp /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py /workspace/after.py && awk 'NR<771 || NR>776{print}' /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py > /workspace/before.py && diff -u /workspace/before.py /workspace/after.py > /workspace/diff.txt || true; sed -n '1,200p' /workspace/diff.txt` executed with exit code 0.
content:
--- /workspace/before.py        2025-12-13 16:39:50.331140013 +0000
+++ /workspace/after.py 2025-12-13 16:39:50.328140013 +0000
@@ -768,6 +768,12 @@
     """
     from sympy.core.numbers import igcdex
     a, n, p = as_int(a), as_int(n), as_int(p)
+    # if a is divisible by p then x = 0 is a solution modulo prime p
+    if a % p == 0:
+        if all_roots:
+            return [0]
+        else:
+            return 0
     if n == 2:
         return sqrt_mod(a, p, all_roots)
     # see Hackman "Elementary Number Theory" (2009), page 76

extras.command: cp /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py /workspace/after.py && awk 'NR<771 || NR>776{print}' /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py > /workspace/before.py && diff -u /workspace/before.py /workspace/after.py > /workspace/diff.txt || true; sed -n '1,200p' /workspace/diff.txt
